ref: 12308 śamīˊ1 f. ʻ the tree Prosopis spicigera or Mimosa suma (used in kindling fire) ʼ AV. 2. *śāmika -- (cf. śāˊmīla-<-> ʻ made of this wood ʼ KātyŚr.). [The tree has leguminous pods (see saṅgara -- ): it may therefore be the same as śamī -- 2]
Pk. sami -- , chamī -- f. ʻ a partic. tree used for kindling fire ʼ;
G. samṛī f. ʻ a kind of tree ʼ, samṛɔ m. ʻ a small thorny tree ʼ.
